# AttributeAlignment.MakeUnaligned method

Make an AttributeAlignment that indicates the attribute should not be aligned.

```csharp
public static AttributeAlignment MakeUnaligned(string name)
```

| parameter | description |

| name | Attribute name |

A new unaligned AttributeAlignment
